pr_title: Add support for SameSite attribute in Cookies

timeline.message:
Add support for SameSite attribute in Cookies

Motivation:
There is a revision of the HTTP cookies RFC (6265) in review which adds
a new SameSite attribute
https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-httpbis-rfc6265bis-05#section-5.3.7.

Modifications:
- Add the SameSite attribute support to the SetCookies related APIs

Result:
HttpSetCookies now support the SameSite attribute.

timeline.bodyText: note this PR breaks the public APIs in a few spots (here and constructor of DeafultHttpSetCookie). it could be done in alternative ways but at this point we are still breaking APIs and I'm assuming minimal direct implement/use these APIs.
timeline.author: Scottmitch
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -55,6 +55,15 @@ @Nullable CharSequence expires(); + /** + * Get the value for the + * SameSite attribute. + * @return The value for the + * SameSite attribute. + */ + @Nullable + SameSite sameSite();

replies.bodyText: You could also add a default implementation if you want to minimise breakage... not sure this is needed tho.
replies.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: Ack; I think it is OK to break APIs now.
replies.author: NiteshKant

timeline.bodyText: I just wondered why 16 now... Seems like 8 should be enough ?
timeline.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: 8 and 16 are both functional, but 8 lead to overlap in a bucket between 2 entries and 16 makes it so there is no overlap.
replies.author: Scottmitch

replies.bodyText: javadoc mentions 8 which is stale now.
replies.author: NiteshKant

timeline.bodyText: not really related to this PR but I wondered if you may want to consider adding a Builder at some point as these are quite a few params for a constructor.
timeline.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: lets consider for a followup PR.
replies.author: Scottmitch

timeline.bodyText: why you even need this if its checked in the constructor ?
timeline.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: IntelliJ flags this as a warning (e.g. passing in arguments that maybe null that are no annotated with @Nullable).
replies.author: Scottmitch

timeline.bodyText: nit: the toString() is not needed.
timeline.author: normanmaurer
normanmaurer
